content: *inspired by swedish christmas crackers these socks will keep you stylish and warm during the holidays the socks are worked seamlessly from the toe up with a repeating cable motif featuring a short-row heel and finishing with 1x1 ribbing * **needles & tools** 2 5mm circular needles tapestry needle for weaving in ends cable needle or spare dpn **yarn** 100g järbo mellanraggi 100g = 260m or any sock yarn of your choice **gauge** 30 sts x 42 row in stockinette on 10x10 cm after blocking **size** finished circumference is 19 cm recommended negative ease is 0-2 cm length of sock is 25 cm but is easily adjustable **techniques** judys magic cast on m1r increase m1l increase left leaning cables german short row italian bind off
